name: Paladin
special: If the Paladin doesn?t want to develop any supernatural ability, he can exchange the +10 Banish and +20 Zeon innate bonuses for a +10 Composure per level bonus.

name: Dark Paladin
special: If the Dark Paladin doesn?t want to develop any supernatural ability, he can exchange the +10 Control and +20 Zeon innate bonuses for a +10 Withstand Pain per level bonus.

name: Weaponsmaster
special: Purchasing general weapon modules, archetypical weapon modules, and style modules costs the weaponmaster only half the usual DP

name: Tao
special: Martial arts cost halved (Refer to dominus exxet)

name: Ranger
special: Detect ki bonus only applicable if ability is developed in ki abilities

name: Shadow
special: Ki Concealment bonus only applicable if ability is developed in ki abilities

name: Thief
special: Ki Concealment bonus only applicable if ability is developed in ki abilities

name: Freelancer
special: add 10 to 5 secondary skills per level. Only costs 20 dp to change class to or from a freelancer.
